form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP, N-600 ( (Rev. 9-1-69)

full_text: for 4-15-7011 Form approved. FEE STAMP Budget Bureau No. 43-R0105. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE APPLICATION FOR CERTIFICATE RECEIVED OF CITIZENSHIP 70 APR 15 AM 9:54 Take or mail this application to: IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE I&NS. NEWARK. N.J. Date APRIL 14, 1970 (Print or type) ADA WACHSBERG nee PECKER (Name) (Maiden name, if any) 128 32 STREET (Apartment number, Street address, and, if appropriate, "in care of") ALIEN REGISTRATION BAYONNE HUDSON NEW JERSEY 07002 (City) (County) (State) (ZIP Code) No. 436-2984 (Telephone Number) See Instructions on Pages 5 and 6 I hereby apply to the Commissioner of Immigration and Naturalization for a certificate showing that I am a citizen of the United States of America. (1) I was born in KIEV RUSSIA on march 24 1904 (City) (State or country) (Month) (Day) (Year) (2) My personal description is: Sex FEMALE ; complexion FAIR ; color of eyes BROWN; color of hair BROWN-GRAY height 5 feet 4 inches; weight 132 pounds; visible distinctive marks NONE Marital status: Single; Married; Divorced; Widow(er). (3) I arrived in the United States at NEW YORK H.Y on aBout 1905 (City and State) (Month) (Day) (Year) under the IDA PECKER name by means of DO NOT KNOW (Name of ship or other means of arrival) on U.S. Passport No. issued to me at on (Month) (Day) (Year) on an Immigrant Visa. (4) FILL IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU ARRIVED IN THE UNITED STATES BEFORE JULY 1, 1924. (a) My last permanent foreign residence was WO NOT KNOW (City) (Country) (b) I took the ship or other conveyance to the United States at Do NOT KNOW (City) (Country) (c) I was coming to BENJAMIN PEOKER at BAYONNE, NEWJERSEV (Name of person in the United States) (City and State where this person was living) (d) I traveled to the United States with ESTHER PECKER MOTHER (Names of passengers or relatives with whom you traveled, and their relationship to you, if any) (5) Have you been out of the United States since you first arrived? Yes No. If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH You DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED To RETURN TO THE RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES UNITED STATES MARCH 13/60 april 4/40 TRANS WORLD AIRLINES 701 PHILADEL PHIA, PA. (6) I HAVE NOT filed a declaration of intention to become a citizen of the United States or a petition for naturalization. (have) (have not) (If "have" give full details on a separate sheet of paper this size and attach it, showing question number.) TO THE APPLICANT.-Do not write between the double lines below. Continue on next page. ARRIVAL RECORDS EXAMINED ARRIVAL RECORD FOUND Card index Place Date Index books Name Manifests Manner Marital status Age (Signature of person making search) Form N-600 (Rev. 9-1-69) (1)
